articles.author: Office of Regulatory Affairs
articles.title: American Spices LLC. Recalls Spice Class Ground Cinnamon Because of Possible Health Risk - FDA.gov
articles.description: American Spices, LLC. of Ozone Park, NY is recalling Spice Class brand Ground Cinnamon, because it has the potential to be contaminated with elevated levels of lead. Short term exposures to very low levels of lead may not elicit any symptoms. It is possible t…
